import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import One from '../../assets/images/1.jpg' import Two from '../../assets/images/2.jpg' import Three from '../../assets/images/manage-orders.jpg' import classes from './account.module.css' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import Navbar from '../NavBar/Navbar' import * as actions from '../../store/actions/index' const Account=(props)=> { const {onClicked,onViewProducts}=props useEffect(()=>{ onClicked() onViewProducts() },[onClicked,onViewProducts]) const firstHandler=()=>{ props.history.push('/addresses') } const secondHandler=()=>{ props.history.push('/profile') } const viewCategoriesHandler=()=>{ props.history.push("/viewCategoryForCustomer") } return ( <>

Your Account

Your Addresses

Login and Security

Your Orders

View Categories

) } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch =>{ return{ onClicked: ()=>dispatch(actions.getCategoriesForCustomer()), onViewProducts:()=>dispatch(actions.getProducts()) } } export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(Account)
